Title: Requires all school employees complete student mental wellness training
Summary: Requires all school employees complete student mental wellness training on identifying signs and symptoms of mental health issues, eating disorders, behavioral health disorders, and substance use disorders, the use of evidence-based training programs including, but not limited to, mental health first aid or core elements of such programs to the extent practicable, and safe de-escalation of crisis situations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring all school employees complete student mental wellness training
